## GuiHandlers.setAvatarURL() method

Change avatar

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAvatarURL(url: string, fileData: ArrayBuffer): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | Avatar URL on the Web that can be retrieved from a browser |
|  fileData | ArrayBuffer | Downloaded avatar data |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

Use an avatar URL on the Web
